plot: Bosko is shipwrecked on an island where he is chased by a lion and pursued by simian cannibals.
title: Bosko Shipwrecked!
plot_es: Bosko is shipwrecked on an island where he is chased by a lion and pursued by simian cannibals.
plot_en: Bosko is shipwrecked on an island where he is chased by a lion and pursued by simian cannibals.
